title: Paradise in Hell
timeline: 2 years after Book 1 ending (Jax age 30, Elara age 31)
location: Level 9 Free Level, SSS Headquarters Level 1

knows: Free Level has grown to 400 people across 3 blocks
Clean water, hydroponics, medical clinic all operational
Trade network with Level 8 established
He and Elara have been together for 2 years
Elara is hiding something from him but he trusts her anyway
His paranoia that it will all fall apart persists
Finn knows he's aware of Elara's secrets but doesn't ask
Everything is going well but feels fragile

Jax Varro.physical_state: Tired from constant vigilance, otherwise healthy

knows: She hasn't reported to Ashton in 2 years
She's been living fully as Elara Frost, integrated into Free Level

The truth will destroy her relationship with Jax

The reckoning is imminent

Elara Quinn.physical_state: Tired, tense, running on adrenaline from subconscious warning signals

knows: Power consumption data shows Free Level is much larger than Quinn reported

Director Ashton.physical_state: Hand tremor worsening from stress, otherwise healthy

knows: Jax knows Elara is hiding something

knows: Elara looked worried/scared at the clinic

planted.significance: Foreshadowing his genetic secret - instability from illegal modification
